thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN PLUS El Rancho Inn - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Millbrae, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel near SFO airport
thread.title_full: Nice hotel near SFO airport - Review of BEST WESTERN PLUS El Rancho Inn, Millbrae, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Amsetus
title: Nice hotel near SFO airport
text:
We stayed on our first night at this hotel. There is a phone at SFO airport to call for the free shuttle service (same bus for Dylan hotel). Our OK room was near the pool area on the ground floor. The WiFi connection was very weak from the cheap router in the unit. The complimentary breakfast was very basic, toast, bagels and fruit. The distance to the Bart rail/metro system was a little farther walking distance that we thought, so we moved the following day to the Dylan that was 5 minutes away and had a better breakfast and was about the same price.
Room Tip: Perhaps rooms near lobby have better WiFi reception. See more room tips
